ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Latest_Start_Time__c)), OR( NOT(ISNUMBER(Latest_Start_Time__c)), LEN(Latest_Start_Time__c) < 3, VALUE(Latest_Start_Time__c) < 0, VALUE(Latest_Start_Time__c) > 2400, VALUE(RIGHT(Latest_Start_Time__c,2)) > 59 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Latest End Time must be number and between 0000 and 2400
